name: Mars
funFact: Mars has the largest volcano in the solar system - Olympus Mons, which is nearly three times the height of Mount Everest!

name: Jupiter
satellites: 79+ moons including Io, Europa, Ganymede, Callisto
funFact: Jupiter's Great Red Spot is a storm that has been raging for over 400 years and is larger than Earth!

name: Saturn
funFact: Saturn's rings are made of ice and rock particles, some as small as dust and others as large as mountains!

name: Europa
funFact: Europa has twice as much water as all of Earth's oceans combined, hidden beneath its icy crust!
